item.title: ProcessAllInjectorAnnotatedClasses
item.description: Process all classes that are annotated with the needed annotations

item.title: GenerateDispatchClasses
item.description: This class will on compile time generate classes to handle the dispatching of webrequests

item.description: Process all classes that are annotated with JsonObject

item.title: GenerateEndpointClasses
item.description: This class will on compile time generate classes to handle the diffent endpoints. For each endpont a class wil be generated, it will dispatch the GET, POST, PUT, DELETE and PATCH actions.
item.author: bgeluykens

item.title: GenerateInjectorClasses
item.description: This class will on compile time generate classes to handle dependency injection
item.author: bgeluykens

item.description: This class will Generate the json Reader

item.title: GenerateJsonWriter
item.description: This class will Generate the json Writer

item.title: MakeContentInjectorClassCommand
item.description: On compiletime: this class wil generate the content for the injector

item.title: MakeContentJsonReaderCommand

item.title: MakeContentRouteDispatcherCommand
